name: Examples with JAX-RS RESTful and CDI
tagline: Examples of how to use JAX-RS RESTful webservices with CDI Bean Injection support in Java EE platform.
body:
### Java - Rest + CDI
Recently, a colleague of mine needed to implement some RESTful Web Services on the JavaEE platform. At some point he asked for my help making the code run.

After some dull tries I went home and finished a sample example so I could show and help him finish his task.

### Tech stuff
I used the following:
* Eclipse Mars 2 4.5.2
* Wildfly 10.0 Final (JEE 7, Weld impl. for CDI)
* Jersey Servlet 1.19.1
* Apache Maven 3.3.9
* Java JDK 1.8.0_74 64 Bits
* Windows 10 Home SL
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
